resolution_summary: Successfully added the missing claim record to the claims_medical table for member_id MEM101.
steps_taken: Identified the missing row in the claims_medical table for member_id MEM101.
Gathered specific claim details required for the record.
Executed the SQL command to add the missing claim record to the claims_medical table.
Verified the addition of the record by querying the table.
lessons_learned: Importance of regular audits on the claims_medical table to prevent missing records.

follow_up_actions: Schedule a review of the claims_medical table for other potential missing records.
Implement a monitoring system to alert on discrepancies in the claims data.
